snippet: The settlement ends what the Justice Department called Lender Processing Services’ involvement in a scheme to file more than 1 million fraudulently signed mortgage documents.
abstract: Justice Department says mortgage servicing company Lender Processing Services has agreed to pay $35 million to resolve federal criminal investigation into foreclosure fraud; deal ends Lender Processing Services’ involvement in scheme to file more than 1 million fraudulently signed mortgage documents.
lead_paragraph: The settlement ends what the Justice Department called Lender Processing Services’ involvement in a scheme to file more than 1 million fraudulently signed mortgage documents.
